artist: Artist: Takehara Shunchōsai; Author: Akisato Ritō
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; white label with black text on cover; text with images including people at a festival, Western men eating at a restaurant, panoramic landscape views with labels, people in gardens, travelers in the rain, man on horseback
inscription: on first page, in black: inscription
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Kyoto, Supplement (Shūi miyako meisho zue 拾遺都名所圖會)
text: Second of four supplement volumes to the Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Kyoto that was published in the previous year. This volume is devoted to 左青竜 hidari Seiryū, the left side of Seiryūchō.
title: Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Kyoto, Supplement, vol. 2
